siteDescription: A simple browser extension that applies the OpenDyslexic font. For some of us, that small change makes reading a lot easier.
heroDescription: A minimal browser extension that applies a dyslexic‑friendly font to websites. In case reading has ever felt hard, this might help. Free forever:)
feature3Desc: Skip pages where the font change could cause issues.
feature4Desc: Matches your system theme or choose manually.
feature5Desc: Works on Chrome/Firefox compatible browsers (including Firefox for Android).
feature6Desc: Available in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and Russian.
